sentences.en: And that's not ailing, not by a long shot.
sentences.cn: 还不止这些, 远远不止这些.

sentences.en: He desperately needed cash to bail out the ailing restaurant.
sentences.cn: 他急需现金使经营惨淡的餐馆走出困境。

sentences.en: He is said to be ailing at his home in Washington.
sentences.cn: 据说他身体欠佳，正呆在华盛顿的家中。

sentences.en: Huge sums of private capital will be ploughed into the ailing industries of the east.
sentences.cn: 巨额私人资本将投入东部处境困难的一些行业。

sentences.en: I am very feeble and ailing today.
sentences.cn: 我今天身子很弱,不舒服.

sentences.en: Now, learning the worst, the ailing old man rallied.
sentences.cn: 这会儿, 得悉了恶耗, 这位害病的老人倒复原了.

sentences.en: Physicians have tried for centuries to rejuvenate ailing paints with animal organs.
sentences.cn: 医生已试验了几个世纪用动物器官为病人做器官移植.

sentences.en: She had been ailing for some time.
sentences.cn: 她长期以来身体就不太好.

sentences.en: She has been ailing for a long time.
She helps take care of her ailing aunt.
sentences.cn: 她帮助照料体弱的姑妈.

sentences.en: The ailing man alternated two hours of work with one hour of rest.
sentences.cn: 这个病人每工作两小时休息一小时.

sentences.en: The poor is ailing from inflation.
sentences.cn: 由于通货膨胀,穷人们处境艰难.

sentences.en: They discussed the problems ailing the steel industry.
sentences.cn: 他们讨论了困扰钢铁工业的问题。

sentences.en: This deal would offer the best possible pick-me-up to the town's ailing economy.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易对该镇每况愈下的经济是一服最好的强心剂。

sentences.en: Weak and ailing people were heartened and healed by his presence.
sentences.cn: 弱者和病人,一见了他就振作起来,并被治愈了.

trans.tran_en: ill and not likely to get better

trans.tran_cn: 使受病痛，使痛苦(ail的ing形式)
